verbs.description: Mrs. Trump 's gown [V: was] described as a black Chantilly lace haute - couture gown , hand painted with silver and embroidered with crystal and sequins .
[ARG1: Mrs. Trump 's gown] was [V: described] [ARG2: as a black Chantilly lace haute - couture gown , hand painted with silver and embroidered with crystal and sequins] .
Mrs. Trump 's gown was described as a black Chantilly lace haute - couture gown , [ARGM-MNR: hand] [V: painted] [ARG2: with silver] and embroidered with crystal and sequins .
